# Jamie Chen

> Full-stack engineer building developer tools

![Jamie Chen](https://jamiechen.dev/avatar.jpg)

## Now

- Building an open-source SDK generator
- Contributing to the OpenAPI spec working group
- Writing a CLI design guide

## Skills

- Developer experience
- API design
- CLI tooling

## Stack

- TypeScript, Go, Rust
- Node.js, Deno
- PostgreSQL, Redis

## Work

- [sdk-gen](https://github.com/jamiechen/sdk-gen) - Open-source SDK generator
- [api-linter](https://github.com/jamiechen/api-linter) - OpenAPI spec linter

## Writing

- [Designing CLI Tools](https://jamiechen.dev/blog/cli-design) - A guide to building great CLIs
- [API Versioning](https://jamiechen.dev/blog/api-versioning) - Best practices for API versioning

## Links

- [GitHub](https://github.com/jamiechen): Open source projects
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jamiechen): Tech thoughts and threads
- [Website](https://jamiechen.dev): Blog and portfolio
- [Email](mailto:hi@jamiechen.dev)

## Preferences

- Communication: Async-first (GitHub issues, email)
- Timezone: US Pacific (UTC-8)
- Response time: Within 24-48 hours
- Meetings: Only when async won't work
